import React, { Component} from 'react' import Afternav from "../Coponent/nav_after"; const options = [ { value: 'single economy', label: 'single economy' }, { value: 'single basic', label: 'single basic' }, { value: 'single standard', label: 'single standard' }, { value: 'single deluxe', label: 'single deluxe' }, { value: 'double economy', label: 'double economy' }, { value: 'double basic', label: 'double basic' }, { value: 'double standard', label: 'double standard' }, { value: 'double deluxe', label: 'double deluxe' }, { value: 'family economy', label: 'family economy' }, { value: 'family basic', label: 'family basic' }, { value: 'family standard', label: 'family standard' }, { value: 'family deluxe', label: 'family deluxe' }, { value: 'presidential', label: 'presidential' } ]; export default class Host extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { rid:"01", sid:"s01", slug:" ", type: " ", city: " ", Suburb:" ", Address:" ", name: " ", description: " ", price: " ", capacity: 0, pets: false, breakfast: false, airconditioner: false, carpark: false, wifi: false, gym: false, kitchen: false, url1: " ", url2:" ", url3:" ", url4:" ", url5:" " } } handleSubmit1= (event) =>{ let url="http://127.0.0.1:8081/v2/room"; const data=this.state; console.log(data); fetch(url,{ method: 'post', headers:{ 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/xml' }, body: JSON.stringify(data) }).then((result) => { result.json().then((resp)=>{ console.log(resp) if(resp==="Succeed"){ alert("succeed") } }) }) } handleInputChange = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() this.setState({ [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } handleInputChange1 =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() if(e.target.value ==="on"){ this.setState({ [e.target.name] : true }) } } handleInputChang2 = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() const parsed = parseInt(event.target.value, 10); this.setState({ [event.target.name] : parsed }) } render() { const { type } = this.state const { address } = this.state const { name } = this.state const { description } = this.state const { price } = this.state const { city } = this.state const { Suburb } = this.state return (
